basics.name: Stefan Riedel
basics.label: Research and Software Engineer in Audio/Music Technology
basics.summary: Researcher, developer and music producer specialised in the emerging field of 3D Audio/Ambisonics. I have experience in system design and music production for hemispherical loudspeaker arrays, compact spherical loudspeaker arrays and Binaural 3D Audio.

MagLS Binaural Decoder based on HRIRs with Distance Room Model
